common.tagline: Data-driven commercial district analysis · AI startup recommendations
common.disclaimer: Analysis results are for reference only. We are not liable for investment or business decisions.

landing.heroSubtitle:
Start a successful business with
nationwide commercial data and AI analysis
landing.searchPlaceholder: Enter an address to analyze (e.g., Gangnam Station)
landing.quickAction1Desc: Browse nearby commercial districts on the map in real-time
landing.quickAction2Desc: AI recommends the optimal business type for your location
landing.quickAction3Desc: Verify startup success probability with data
landing.feature1Desc: Real-time analysis of government public data from SMBA, Statistics Korea, and more
landing.feature2Desc: Google Gemini AI synthesizes data to provide actionable insights
landing.feature3Desc: Analyze commercial districts across all regions of South Korea
landing.feature4Desc: Use all analysis features for free without any limitations
landing.step1Desc: Choose a location on the map or search by address
landing.step2Desc: Review comprehensive data on industries, population, rent, and transportation
landing.step3Desc: AI recommends optimal business types and analyzes feasibility
landing.ctaSubtitle: Analyze nationwide commercial districts and get AI recommendations for free

search.title: AI Data Search
search.subtitle: Search nationwide commercial data with natural language
search.placeholder: Ask a question (e.g., How many cafes are near Gangnam Station?)
search.example1: Where is the cheapest apartment in the country?
search.example2: Top 10 neighborhoods with the most cafes
search.example3: Which neighborhood in Seoul has the fewest chicken restaurants?
